aws_services: S3 Bucket, VPC, IAM, IGW, ALB, DNS, EC2, Auto Scaling, NAT Gateway, Route Tables, Security Groups
background: Production-grade web application infrastructure deployed in AWS us-east-1 with high availability across multiple AZs. Includes secure S3 storage with versioning and blocked public access, VPC with public/private subnet isolation, EC2 instances with Elastic IPs, Auto Scaling Group (min=2, max=4), Application Load Balancer for traffic distribution, IAM roles following least-privilege principles, and comprehensive security groups. All infrastructure consolidated in single tap_stack.tf file. Includes 118 passing tests (81 unit + 37 integration) with 100% success rate.
author: koushik-turing
